scripts.min: uglifyjs --compress --screw-ie8 -v --mangle -- js1k.js > js1k.ugly.js && regpack js1k.ugly.js --hash2DContext --contextVariableName 'c' --crushGainFactor 0 --crushLengthFactor 0 --crushCopiesFactor 0 > js1k-regpacked.js
scripts.minmath: uglifyjs --compress --screw-ie8 -v --mangle -- js1k.js > js1k.ugly.js && regpack js1k.ugly.js --hash2DContext --withMath --contextVariableName 'c' --crushGainFactor 0 --crushLengthFactor 0 --crushCopiesFactor 0 > js1k-regpacked.js
scripts.release: npm run min && npm run babili && base64 js1k-regpacked.js > js1k.base64
scripts.babili: babili js1k.js > js1k.babili.js && regpack js1k.babili.js --hash2DContext --contextVariableName 'c' --crushGainFactor 1 --crushLengthFactor 0 --crushCopiesFactor 0 > js1k-regpacked-babili.js
